mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, CONTENTS, TITLE FROM IDEA_BOARD

SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.articleDate FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.articleDate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, USER_ID userId, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, REGDATE articleDate FROM IDEA_BOARD) a WHERE rn <= 9 * #{pageNum}) a WHERE rn > 9 * (#{pageNum} - 1)
SELECT COUNT(CONFIRM) FROM IDEA_BOARD WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND CONFIRM='Y'
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_IDX) FROM IDEA_BOARD WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
